name: Switching the Level
description:
Switch the Level is my first ever game and it is TERRIBLE, so don't download it thinking it's amazing. If you like, you can remake the game and make it better. If you do so, please send StarteRazvi_YT#2540 on discord the updated game or give a link to the Itch page of the updated game. (If you publish it on Itch please give credit for the original, don't say that it was your idea from the beginning) If you want and your remade version of this game is better, I will update this game with yours, but ONLY if you want me to. (Credit will OBVIOUSLY be given to you and I will turn off donations) I will NOT make this game pay to play or something like that even if someone remakes it better since I don't want to get money from other people's work.

W - Jump           A - Move Left              D - Move Right                  SPACE - Switch
